entry.title: Disney Speedstorm Launches In Full Later This Year
entry.content:
Gameloft has announced that Disney Speedstorm is leaving early access and will be fully released later this year on September 28.
The game has been in early access since it was released in April, and new content has been added, which includes characters, race tracks, and more.
You need a javascript enabled browser to watch videos.

Now Playing: Disney Speedstorm - Launch Trailer
Disney Speedstorm is a kart racer where you play as popular Disney characters and race each other to the finish line. Similar to Mario Kart, each race track includes a variety of power-ups you can use to help give you the upper hand. From now until September 30, you can purchase the Founder's Pack for $30, that's on sale right now for 20% off for the next 10 days, which gives you exclusive content such as in-game currency, Mickey Mouse and Donald Duck as racers, and more. And when the game fully launches, it'll be free-to-play on the Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch, and PC.
In our Disney Speedstorm preview, Steve Watts wrote, "While the first few hours of Disney Speedstorm are a raucous joyride, the leveled gating mechanics and confusing web of menus are a blinking 'check engine' light. It doesn't immediately spoil the fun, but it's definitely cause for alarm."


詳細句子文法解析：
1. Gameloft has announced that Disney Speedstorm is leaving early access and will be fully released later this year on September 28.

這個句子是一個簡單的陳述句，用於描述Gameloft宣布了Disney Speedstorm正在離開早期測試階段，並將在今年9月28日正式發行。"is leaving" 和 "will be fully released" 是將來進行式，用於描述將來發生的動作。重點是將來進行式的應用。

2. The game has been in early access since it was released in April, and new content has been added, which includes characters, race tracks, and more.

這個句子中，"has been" 和 "has been added" 是現在完成進行式，用於描述從過去某個時間開始並持續到現在的動作，強調過去開始的時間點和繼續進行的時間長度。重點是現在完成進行式的用法。

3. You need a javascript enabled browser to watch videos.

這個句子是一個陳述句，用於表示觀看視頻需要一個啟用了javascript的瀏覽器。重點是使⽤動詞 "need" 表示需要某⽣以及形容詞 "enabled" 修飾名詞 "browser"。

4. Want us to remember this setting for all your devices?

這個句子是⼀個問題句，用於詢問是否希望記住此設置，以⽤於所✎有的設備。重點是 "want" + 名⩔ + 不定式結構的⽤法。

5. Sign up or Sign in now!

這個句子是⼀個命令句，表示現在要註冊或登錄⽤戶帳號。重點是對話中常⽤的命令句型。

6. By clicking 'enter', you agree to GameSpot's Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

這個句子是⼀個陳述句，表示通過點擊"enter"按鈕，你同意遵守GameSpot的使用條款和隱私政策。重點是使⽤介詞短語 "by + V-ing" 表示通過某種⾏為發⽣的動作。

7. Disney Speedstorm is a kart racer where you play as popular Disney characters and race each other to the finish line.

這個句子是⼀個陳述句，描述了Disney Speedstorm是⼀款卡通賽車遊戲，玩家扮演受歡迎的迪斯尼角⾊，互相競賽直到抵達終點。重點是介紹這款遊戲的性質和目標。

8. Similar to Mario Kart, each race track includes a variety of power-ups you can use to help give you the upper hand.

這個句子是⼀個陳述句，表示與馬⾥奧賽車遊戲類似，每個賽道都包含各種道具，你可以使⽤它們來獲得優勢。重點是⽤ "similar to" 表達相似之處，以及動詞短語 "can use" 表⽰能夠使⽤的能⼒。

9. From now until September 30, you can purchase the Founder's Pack for $30, that's on sale right now for 20% off for the next 10 days, which gives you exclusive content such as in-game currency, Mickey Mouse and Donald Duck as racers, and more.

這個句子描述了一個時間段內的購物活動。重點是表述限定時間內的特價優惠以及介紹購買Founder's Pack所能獲得的獨家內容。

10. And when the game fully launches, it'll be free-to-play on the Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch, and PC.

這個句子描述了遊戲正式發行後的價格。重點是表達遊戲正式發行後的價格政策。

單字：
1. leaving (離開) - J: 出発する (shuppatsu suru)
2. early access (早期測試) - J: 早期アクセス (souki akusesu)
3. released (發行) - J: リリースされました (rirīsu sa remashita)
4. content (內容) - J: コンテンツ (kontentsu)
5. characters (角色) - J: キャラクター (kyarakutā)
6. race tracks (賽車賽道) - J: レーストラック (rēsu torakku)
7. javascript (JavaScript) - J: JavaScript (jābāsuchipuritto)
8. enabled (啟用) - J: 有効にされました (yūkō ni sa remashita)
9. watch (觀看) - J: 見る (miru)
10. devices (設備) - J: デバイス (debaizu)

片語：
1. Early access - 早期測試
相似片語: Exclusive access - 獨家測試
反義片語: Public access - 公開測試

2. Fully released - 完全發行
相似片語: Partially released - 部分發行
反義片語: Unreleased - 未發行的

3. Free-to-play - 免費遊玩
相似片語: Pay-to-play - 付費遊玩
反義片語: Subscription-based - 訂閱制
